# *How do i compile FlowLib for .Net Compact framework?*
  * Change references so they point to .Net Compact.
  * Define constant "COMPACT_FRAMEWORK". You are doing this on project level in Visual Studio. (This is so functionality that is not supported by compact framework will not be included)
